channel.title: How do you fix bugged items?
channel.description:
The source I am using (hiyascape) seems to have alot of item bugs is there a way i can fix these some examples of items i am having trouble with is:
skillcape hoods go in right spot but you can see alot of the players head. alot of items are going in the weapon slot.
if you want the rest just ask me ill find more bugged items and post
thankyou

item.title: How do you fix bugged items?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Right, maybe because my server isn’t up yet shit-for-brains.

And you don’t have a life, mommy-wommy said it’s beddy-weddy time.

Now stop spamming someone elses thread.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you fix bugged items?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“TranScape, post:15, topic:181501”]As You say tut for every single one i’ve realized that you are wrong for a simple reason of there are no tuts for them as far as i know. if there are you should use them so you might get a total of 100 players that have ever played on your server

pfft no life[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2008, 07:55:53 PM[/size][hr]o and by the way 2 members on your forums is PRETTY cool man i would feel excited[/quote]

Um, okay? I hardly use C&P tuts, unless I am not capable of doing it and have tried for hours and failed. And back about a year ago when there weren’t retards like you flooding the forums, my HAM server had average of 20 people and 1.6k char files in 2 weeks?

And I don’t really care about my forums.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you fix bugged items?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i’ve added fully working global objects to dodain - TUT
i’ve added 10 fully working skills to dodain - either TUT or basic item on item shit
i’ve added highscores to dodain - TUT
i’ve added fully working requirements to dodain - wow, that’s hard
i’ve added fully working membership to dodian - wow, that’s hard
i’ve added Skillcape emotes and removed all duping from dodain - skill capes most likely a tut
